title: Diablous King: The King series book 1: A mafia series.
description: Diablo is a cold-hearted mafia king who's a single father. He had a bad experience with an ex-lover, which made his trust in women fall. That is until the babysitter walks into his life.Will she be able to understand their line of work? Their way of life? Or will it be too much for her?She comes from a life where she only had her two siblings to lean on, perhaps working for the King's will reveal secrets and a whole new identity.
author: Aura Bud
